pageContext.claim:
Question: "Are you inflaming racial tensions?"
Trump: "No, this has nothing to do with race. I've never said anything about race. This has nothing to do with race or anything else. This has to do with respect for our country, and respect for our flag.‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: NFL players who decided to kneel during the anthem prior to the game said it was an act of protest against police brutality of black Americans.
